elements.name: question2
elements.title: Tick those that are closest to you in your own life.
choices: If I fail an exam, I'm a total failure.
It's so much - I'll never manage it!
I'm usually not in the right mood to study at school.
I've never been good at language & communication.
I always get up again after defeats.
You can or you can't do certain things.
Negative thoughts are simply part of it, I try to overcome them.
With some teachers, it's clear that you're not motivated.
Sometimes I get stuck, but I don't give up.
I don't have to be perfect, but I want to get a little better.
I just can't remember anything.
I always learn the wrong things.
School is not my thing.
I just can't concentrate.
If others can do it, I can do it too.
I want to show my company that I am committed.
I just do the minimum - that has to be enough.
I want to get the best out of myself.
There are more important things than doing well at school.
I could actually do that tomorrow.
